title: When The Jaguar Sleeps
description: Book Award Winner in the Readers' Favorite 2017 Book Award Contest in the Category Fiction-Adventure!A plane crash in the Amazon jungle. A desperate struggle for survival. A hidden Inca treasure. Ruthless grave robbers.Ecuador. A dream holiday turns into a nightmare when two men are stranded in the Amazon rain forest after a plane crash. With no hope of being rescued, they decide that their only chance of survival is to find their way back to civilization. And so they set off on a daring journey, struggling through the dense underbrush, totally unprepared for the dangers that lie ahead. When they stumble upon some ancient ruins where fabulous treasures might be hidden, it all goes wrong again â€¦ Looking for a fast-moving adventure thriller you won't be able to put down until you finish it? Then try this one.
author: J.A. Kalis
